Overview.Affected by: All, Gun Damage, Enhancement, Soup, Amp, Skill Damage, Action SKill Damage, Gear Crit, Skill Tree Crit, Minion Damage, Flat On Shot, Order Charge, Status Effect Damage
Overview.Notes: Base damage refers to a single bullet/damage instance

Gun Damage.Affected by: All, Gun Damage, Enhancement, Soup, Amp, Gear Crit, Skill Tree Crit, Flat On Shot, Order Charge
Gun Damage.Notes: Gun Card Damage refers to a single bullet/damage instance

Enhancement.Notes: Most enhancement effects that add damage to guns apply here.

Flat On Shot.Notes: Damage boosts based on flat numbers will be divided by total bullets fired per shot.

Soup.Example: Damage Dealt Passive on Class Mods, Elemental Damage boosts
Soup.Notes: This applies to everything, and if something double dips it will be double dipped!

Skill Damage.Applies to: If it's from your skill tree and is a seperate damage instance, this probably works
Skill Damage.Example: Skill Passive on Class Mods, I am a Gun
Skill Damage.Notes: All action skills are skills, not all skills are action skills.

Action Skill Damage.Applies to: All Action Skills and specific special VH specific skills
Action Skill Damage.Example: Action Skill Damage on Class Mods

Gear Crit.Applies to: Almost exclusively guns, does not work on body shot crits.
Gear Crit.Example: Crit Damage innate to a gun

Skill Tree Crit.Example: Critical damage boosts found in your skill tree

Minion Damage.Notes: What are you? A Vex main?
